author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of a State-wide initiative, the second special camp for electoral rolls was held at 1096 places in the district on Saturday .

Officials said that forms were accepted in more than 2,000 polling booths for inclusion to the electoral roll, deletion and changes.

Collector K. Veera Raghava Rao inspected the exercise at the polling booths in Mathur, Kathakinaru, Kadachanendal and Moondrumavadi under Madurai East Assembly constituency.

Officials, however, said that the response was not overwhelming compared to the previous special camp organised last Sunday at all the polling booths. They added that though no more special camps had been planned, forms for addition, deletion and changes could be done online through the facilitation centres on the Collectorate premises, offices of the Revenue Divisional Officer (RDO) of Madurai and Usilampatti and Deputy Commissioner’s Office in Madurai Corporation.
title: Special camp for electoral rolls held
